info.title: CREATE:
info.text: Type a new Message and send

info.title: UPDATE:
info.text: Tap or click on your message and edit

info.title: DELETE:
info.text: Tap or click on your message and select delete

info.title: USER Info:
info.text: Tap or click on the user avatar

info.title: SHARE:
info.text: Tap or click on the share icon
